cast.overview: This year, instead of its annual KBS Song Festival, KBS will be holding a year-end “2023 Music Bank Global Festival” in both Japan and Korea. While the Japanese show will be pre-recorded in Saitama on December 9, both the Korean show and the Japanese show will air together on December 15 as two halves of one year-end special.
cast.title: 2023 KBS Music Bank Global Festival
